item.description: A beautiful, must-read letter from a soon-to-be father to his hypothetically gay son (via @AskDadBlog) http://t.co/GLns53wo
item.content:encoded: A beautiful, must-read letter from a soon-to-be father to his hypothetically gay son (via @AskDadBlog) http://t.co/GLns53wo My son is living in his mom's belly right now, so obviously we don't know his sexual orientation. Still, the letter I read Tuesday morning made me wonder what my letter would say if the news that my son was gay ended up being a surprise. So here it is. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: Obama camp acknowledges knowing man's story
item.description: The Obama campaign is now acknowledging that they know the story of the man who starred in their own ads. http://t.co/2ADhMHA9
item.content:encoded: The Obama campaign is now acknowledging that they know the story of the man who starred in their own ads. http://t.co/2ADhMHA9 Obama campaign spokeswoman Jen Psaki acknowledged Thursday that the campaign was no longer pleading ignorance about the story of a man who has appeared in both a super PAC ad and a campaign ad. "No one is denying he was in one of our campaign ads. He was on a conference call telling his story," Psaki told reporters on Air Force One. Missouri... Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Lego Gymnastics Olympics 2012 - a tribute to Epke
item.content:encoded: http://t.co/VgVQpWKv Lego video ter ere van jouw fantastische overwinning! @epkez #despelen #london2012 #lego #ziningoud This video is made to celebrate the legendary victory of Epke Zonderland on the Horizontal Bar final during the 2012 Olympic Games in London. Epke is the first Dutch athlete to win any medal during an individual gymnastics final! The video is a Lego stop motion video. Comments are from Hans van Zetten; also legendary! Deze Lego stop motion video is gemaakt ter ere van de fantastische overwinning van Epke in de turn finale aan de rekstok. Ook het commentaar van Hans van Zetten is geweldig. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: youtube.com
